title: Duoflex Multi-Purpose Paper, 8.5" x 11", 500 Sheets, White (DP500W)
highlights: Designed for writing, sketching, and emergency hygienic use.
Soft-texture surface compatible with pens, pencils, and... personal needs.

description.header: Be ready for anything with Duoflex Multi-Purpose Paper — write your notes or wipe your worries.
description.paragraph: Duoflex Multi-Purpose Paper combines functionality and flexibility. Whether you're taking notes or facing a toilet paper crisis, this innovative sheet has you covered — literally. Crafted from smooth yet gentle fibers, it balances absorbency with durability. Ideal for students, professionals, and preppers alike.
bullets: Smooth surface ideal for ink and graphite.
Gentle enough for skin, septic-safe and biodegradable.
500 sheets per ream; suitable for office or bathroom emergencies.
Acid-free for long-lasting written records (and comfortable wipes).
Compatible with printers, notebooks, and personal hygiene.
